pullrequest.title: Modeling of simspark NAO robot and its Controller

content.raw: I want to know that this segmentation faults happen right after running the agent or not? If yes, It seems that the simulator can not access to the model sdf file, or it can not read that sdf file. I don't have that issue, please let me know when the segmentation fault happens.
content.html: I want to know that this segmentation faults happen right after running the agent or not? If yes, It seems that the simulator can not access to the model sdf file, or it can not read that sdf file. I don't have that issue, please let me know when the segmentation fault happens.
